- Location: interior wall above window opening; living area window.
- Materials: plaster/drywall wall, wood window trim, metal mounting bracket.
- Hardware: small metal bracket mounted to wall (likely for curtain rod/valance).
- Condition: minor paint chipping around bracket; no visible water staining or framing issues.
